titles.title: Condemning the racist and anti-Semitic views of the Reverend Al Sharpton.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 3/8/2000--Introduced. Declares that Congress: (1) condemns the practices of the Reverend Al Sharpton; (2) expresses its outrage over the violence that has resulted due to his incendiary words and actions; and (3) fervently urges elected officials and public servants, who have condoned and legitimized such words and actions, to publicly denounce and condemn such racist and anti-Semitic views.
